metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34478 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ms-msdt, search, and search-msprotocols deliver content to Microsoft applications, bypassing the browser,when a user accepts a prompt. These applications have had knownvulnerabilities, exploited in the wild (although we know of none exploitedthrough Thunderbird), so in this release Thunderbird has blocked theseprotocols from prompting the user to open them.
*This bug only affectsThunderbird on Windows. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 102, Firefox ESR < 91.11, Thunderbird <102, and Thunderbird < 91.11.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
